body.name: Sound Tech TableTop Conference Microphone Kit ,4 Microphones daisy chain, CM-1000USB CM-1000
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
features: High quality components with high level output
4 microphones included, Perfect for Large conference meetings
Record in real high quality stereo
body.description: Low profile yet powerful recording capabilities, record large conference meeting in full high stereo quality, this kit include one USB conference microphone and 3 microphones with standard stereo audio plug. These microphones have a daisy chain compatibility which means that you can connect them to each other, check images for better understanding. Simply connect the USB microphone to your PC, and connect 1 microphone to left and 2 to the right and you will be able to capture every word in stereo quality. Each microphone has 5 feet cord for easier expanding and each microphone comes with its own pouch for easy storage.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 54 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work amazing
reviews.reviewText: I don't have great pictures because these were mounted discretely under a board room table that was being converted into a new Microsoft Teams conference room. These mic's are daisy chained under the table connected to a docking station via USB that connects to a laptop. They pick up whispers in each corner of the room and provide a very clear sound through the teams calls. These daisy chain through an aux connection then the starting pod connects through USB to the laptop / device. easy to set up, although initially i thought i could split off from the start pod as a 'left pod' and 'right pod' then chain off of one of those, they don't work this way, it seems to be one pod -> one pod -> one pod -> one pod (rather than one pod <- base pod -> one pod -> one pod). It turned out ok, just required more testing before hand.the underside of the mic pods have a rubber like texture, i did use double sided tape (30lb outdoor type), and it does work and so far, a few weeks in still holding up just fine.strongly recommend for anyone building a conference room and doesn't want to use the expensive huddle room packages offered by other companies. Plus... no batteries to worry about charging / dying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing microphones. Totally solved our conference room audio issues.
reviews.reviewText: These mics are amazing. We went through a bunch of different options trying to find a mic system that worked. This is the first system that actually worked in our large boardroom. I'm going to switch to using these for every single one of our conference room. Amazing how well these work considering the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these several months ago and did not get a chance to use them for an actual meeting until today. They did not work -- the main microphone worked OK, the other connected units did not work at all. I think the main mic was the only unit picking up sound. These were an expensive mistake for me as they will likely be thrown in the tech recycling bin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These Work Very Well
reviews.reviewText: I was a little leery of the quality of these as they are both inexpensive and have some low ratings. I purchased them anyway, set them up and once I figured out that one is different from the rest and must be positioned near the computer, we were in business. We used them for a Zoom meeting with about 15 people sitting around tables with about 15 to 18 feet between them and the sound was picked up just fine and was clear to the people on the other end. I would recommend these. I didn't rate them five stars mainly because they are so small and light, it is easy for them to get moved and knocked around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: They work of in a smaller room but not so great in larger rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great - I could not ask for more.
reviews.reviewText: 10/10 - amazing little product. Using it with Zoom video conferencing (like Skype) on a conference table that seats 18. Everybody is heard clearly. They look good, they seem well made, instructions were clear (pictures, I like pictures) and they worked right out of the box. Windows 10 picked them up as a USB microphone, no drivers were needed. I think you will like this product. (1 primary and 3 remotes).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted!
reviews.reviewText: These little microphones were just what I wanted--I was looking for unobtrusive mics to place around a conference room during a hybrid meeting (some folks in person, some on Zoom). These little mics were surprisingly effective (once I remembered to make sure that that laptop running Zoom was using the USB microphone array, not its internal microphone). People online were able to hear even some of the soft-spoken people in the meeting. They're also really easy to set up. I purchased two extras, and used the 6 microphones for a group of 25 people sitting around a u-shaped table.They're not going to be the best sound quality in the world--if you want to ensure every single word is heard, you might want to get individual tabletop mics. But for something easy and affordable that captures the discussion in a room without getting in the way, you can't do much better. Very glad I found them. My only wish is that you could string more than 6 of them together. I might try adding another one or two and see how it goes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have a large open conference area where it has been very difficult for 8+ individuals to be heard while on Zoom calls. These microphones enable us to spread across the area and now can hear everyone clearly. Great product.
広い会議室で使っています。部屋の大きさによって接続するマイクの個数を変えることができるので、便利です。ハウリングもなく、音質も良いようで、購入して良かったです
These have worked well in our small conference room 8 x 4 meters.
Conference room use, works great, delivery very speedy
各種会議形態に対応でき、マイクの感度も良い模様。
